sqlGroup.name: contact
sqlGroup.sql: select 'corpContact' type,count(cc.CContactID) count from zq_corpcontact cc where cc.CorpID=? union select 'groupContact' type,count(gm.MemberID) count from zq_contactgroupmember gm left join zq_usercontactgroup ug on ug.ContactGroupID=gm.ContactGroupID where ug.UserID=?
